name: Re:SWAT
description:
A game where you are a SWAT member that can rewind time. Go back in time and deal with rescue hostage situations, lawbreakers, bankroberies and more.

 While rewinding time, the position and status(injured, dead, alive) of the people around you will go back in time, but your location and available resources won't refill or change.

Your main goal is to deal with the "la Calavera" cartel and end its influence in the city.

Rescue the all the hostages in the levels and take your enemies out non-lethally to receive the maximum score!

Although you can play the game on itch, download the game to be able to save and get a better experience overall. Thanks for playing!
